org.springframework.cache.interceptor

接口 CacheResolver

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractCacheResolver, NamedCacheResolver, SimpleCacheResolver, SimpleExceptionCacheResolver
    函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface CacheResolver
    Determine the Cache instance(s) to use for an intercepted method invocation.

    Implementations must be thread-safe.

    从以下版本开始:
    4.1
    作者:
    Stephane Nicoll

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.Collection<? extends Cache> resolveCaches(CacheOperationInvocationContext<?> context)
      Return the cache(s) to use for the specified invocation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • resolveCaches

        java.util.Collection<? extends Cache> resolveCaches(CacheOperationInvocationContext<?> context)
        Return the cache(s) to use for the specified invocation.
        参数:
        context - the context of the particular invocation
        返回:
        the cache(s) to use (never null)
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if cache resolution failed
